name: Horror Hunt: The Terror Has Begin
name_original: Horror Hunt: The Terror Has Begin
description:
One time, Kids In the town started getting missing....

The cops were finding the kids. Alex Owens means the player came back from school, he got to his table to do homework But! suddenly he started hearing kids screaming in the basement. he started moving to the basement and what he saw he couldn't believe. 

His Father Jack Owens Kidnaped the kids! Jack saw Alex and started chasing him, Alex fell down and jack captured him with his skull axe!

Explore the secrets and lore. Escape from the crazy kidnapper! Discover The Dark Reveal about Jack Owens. 

Features:

★ Puzzles : There are several puzzles in game for many escape route, Interesting Puzzles.

★ Discover the story of jack Owens and find out why he is doing this.

★ Bigger Map to Explore!

★ Various game difficulty modes which will make you an skilled hunter.

★ Lot of escape routes.

★ Hint system that will help you to complete puzzles!

Do you dare to play it? Download Horror Hunt for free and share the game to your friends and family and enjoy an terrifying experience.
